mlk_root.title: Divine Authority Pattern

examples.arabic: مَلِك (malik) = king, root m-l-k meaning possess, exercise authority

mlk_root.insight: Same consonantal root operates autonomously across completely different civilizations

examples.hyksos: ḥqꜣ-ḫꜣswt = rulers of foreign lands (15th Dynasty, c. 1650-1550 BC)

examples.hecate: Greek goddess of magic, name identical with Egyptian ḥk3w (magic)

denisovan_crossing.evidence: Ancestry shared by Melanesians, Aboriginal Australians who colonized Australia 65,000-50,000 years ago
denisovan_crossing.mixing_events: At least four independent events with at least two different Denisovan lineages, as recently as 21,000 years ago
denisovan_crossing.liang_sarru: Stone tools and marine shells dated 32,000-35,000 years ago - possibly longest sea voyage by Paleolithic humans

menehune.dating: At least 1,000 years ago, predates 14th-century Tahitian Voyagers
menehune.construction: 120 finely cut basalt blocks, ancient method not seen elsewhere in Hawaii

maritime_evidence.implication: Celestial navigation interface capabilities far exceeding conventional timelines - systematic transmission through autonomous consciousness systems

flood_narratives.phrygian_account: King Nannacus at Iconium, died age 300, predicted Flood, organized public prayers - Deluge of Deucalion followed
major_traditions: Native American - Various magical gourd survival stories

flood_narratives.pattern: Same catastrophic event preserved across cultures through autonomous information transmission - not cultural borrowing but systematic egregore-mediated memory preservation
